TEXT.TITLE: QUARTZ ENGINEERING <QRTZ> GETS SIEMENS ORDER
TEXT.BODY: Quartz Engineering and Materials Inc said it has received a 500,000 dlr order from <Siemens AG> of West Germany for its ATMOSCAN automated environmentally controlled semiconductor wafer processing system. Reuter
